Summary: Extremly bright light going slow across the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was swimming outside with my friend and i looked up in the sky. I Saw something extremly bright, it hurt my eyes to look at it, and then i realized it was moving. I looked up and there was this cross shaped thing moving slowly across the sky. The center is what seemed to glow the most. I showed my friend and she was speechless. Then it sped up really fast and was gone in a second.
